simpleLoading.title:
Don't go away,
we are processing your payment
simpleLoading.description:
Please wait until the payment is successfully completed.
In most cases it doesn't take more than several seconds.

3ds.title:
You will now be redirected
to the bank site for passing 3d security
3ds.description:
After passing the 3d security, the status of receiving money may
come with delay, it depends directly on the bank you use for payment.

systemSuccess.title:
We've got initial success response
from your payment provider
systemSuccess.description:
Wait a little before a final decision comes. Sometimes payment systems
may stuck for a while due to technical reasons.

noMoneyError.title: Declined
noMoneyError.subtitle: You haven’t enough money
noMoneyError.description:
Please go back
and try another payment method

unknownError.title: Bad luck
unknownError.subtitle: An error has occured
unknownError.description:
This error occurs
in 1 case out of 10 000!

success.title: Let's play!

titleSubSlave.key: Activate this key on license provider website. Instruction
titleSubSlave.product: You’ve bought a new game. Enjoy your new experience!
titleSubSlave.virtual_items: A new item awaits you in the game. Enjoy your new experience!
titleSubSlave.virtual_currency: A pack of currency awaits you in the game!

success.descriptionSlaveInitial: Leave your email to get payment receipt

descriptionSlaveFinal.key: We sent payment confirmation and activation key to
descriptionSlaveFinal.product: We sent payment confirmation and access link to

FormSectionBankCard.cvvInfo:
Three digits located
on the back of the card
FormSectionBankCard.rememberInfo: Security of billing data storage is provided in accordance with the requirements of the PCI DSS standard, using 3D Secure and SSL protocols

PaymentAreaWarning.cantAcceptPayments: We cannot accept payments in your area.
PaymentAreaWarning.chooseAnotherArea: Wrong area? Choose the right one

OrderCreationError.title: We're sorry, but we could not create the order to make payment
OrderCreationError.unknownError: This error occurs in 1 case out of 10 000!
